section.title: Pustefix internals page
section.para: The Pustefix internals page provides some useful information for application developers (e.g. environment properties, JVM statistics, loaded modules). The page is only available at development time and can be accessed under /xml/pfxinternals (the <pfx:editconsole/> contains a link too).
On the Pustefix internals page you can additionally find some useful links triggering actions like scheduling a webapp reload or invalidating sessions.
